description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $310.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with University of Alaska Fairbanks. The average
  contract duration was 0.7 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $396.0K. The longest
  contract was 2.53 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $785.9K.
